price: តើពួកគេមិនបានមើលទៅលើផែនដីដែលយើងបានបណុ្ដះ នូវរាល់រុក្ខជាតិហូបផ្លែល្អៗជាច្រើនចេញពីវាទេឬ?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَمۡ أَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجٖ كَرِيمٍ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw ilā al-arḍi kam anbatnā fīhā min kulli zawjin karīmin
